description: This file defines a React functional component named TaskList that renders a list of task items. It accepts props for tasks data, callback functions for editing, deleting, toggling status, and a busy indicator to disable actions. The component displays a message if there are no tasks and otherwise maps each task to a TaskItem component within a styled list.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onEdit, onDelete, onToggleStatus, busy })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of tasks with optional busy state and handlers for editing, deleting, and toggling tasks.

search-terms: props: tasks, onEdit, onDelete, onToggleStatus, busy

ctags.name: TaskList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TaskList({ tasks, onEdit, onDelete, onToggleStatus, busy }) {$/
